VARIABLES.name: x_AppX
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppX

VARIABLES.name: x_AppY
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppY

VARIABLES.name: x_AppZ
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppZ

VARIABLES.name: x_AppW
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppW

VARIABLES.name: x_AppV
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppV

OBJECTIVE.query: The specific part of extracted_queries used for objective
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max Z = \sum_{i \in \{	ext{AppX, AppY, AppZ, AppW, AppV}\}} \left( p_i \cdot x_i - c_i \cdot x_i - m_i \cdot x_i ight)

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 10
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 10
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total number of development teams assigned to AppX, AppY, AppW, and AppV combined must not exceed 10 teams.
The total number of development teams assigned to AppZ and AppV combined must not exceed 28 teams.
AppX must have at least twice as many development teams as AppY.

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \ge 2
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \ge 2
CONSTRAINTS.description: At least two teams are required to be assigned to the AppX development project.

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 30
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 30
CONSTRAINTS.description: The company has a total of 30 development teams available for the quarter.

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \ge 1
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \ge 1
CONSTRAINTS.description: Each product has at least one team working on it.

CONSTRAINTS.query: m_{	ext{AppX}} + m_{	ext{AppY}} + m_{	ext{AppW}} + m_{	ext{AppV}} \le 2500000
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: m_{	ext{AppX}} + m_{	ext{AppY}} + m_{	ext{AppW}} + m_{	ext{AppV}} \le 2500000
CONSTRAINTS.description: The company has a budget of $2,500,000 for marketing costs for the quarter.
